description: Advances from a bustling town to a veritable metropolis, full of the wonders of modern technology. This is the Spartan city phase, where Infantry cost 10% less metal but take 10% longer to train.
tooltip: Advance to Town Phase, which unlocks more entities and technologies. Civic Centers +25% territory influence radius and 25% more garrison capacity. Structures +10% damage and +7 capture points regeneration rate per garrisoned unit. All Citizens 10% more health.  Infantry cost 15% less metal but spearman 10% longer to train
